awd_titl_txt: 10th International Symposium on Flavins and Flavoproteins,  Villa Olmo on Lake Como, Italy July 15-20, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: This grant is to provide the airfare for about nine young                       scientists at the early stage of their career to attend and                     participate in the 10th International Symposium on Flavins and                  Flavoproteins to be held, July 15-20, 1990 at Villa Olmo on Lake                Como, Italy.  The field of flavin (vitamin B2) research is                      extremely broad, covering a diversity of topics ranging from                    basic chemistry to physiolgy and medicine.  The first symposium                 of the series was held in Amsterdam in 1965 and since then it has               been held at three year intervals in different countries.                       The symposium will bring together an interdisciplinary group of                 scientists working on various aspects of flavins and                            flavoproteins. It will promote discussion and exchange of ideas                 in an important area of biochemical research.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences
